content.body: we should turn off the check in the mean time, I suppose
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: we should turn off the check in the mean time, I suppose

content.body: are we in that much of a rush to get the PR in?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: are we in that much of a rush to get the PR in?

content.body: if you haven't noticed, things move a little slowly around here
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: if you haven't noticed, things move a little slowly around here

content.body: I thought that's what we said the plan was?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I thought that's what we said the plan was?

content.body: I don't want things to be blocked on waiting for esmeta to update
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I don't want things to be blocked on waiting for esmeta to update

content.body: I'm fine either way, I'm just patient and lazy so would opt to wait until next week
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I'm fine either way, I'm just patient and lazy so would opt to wait until next week

content.body: actually my opinion is stronger: I'd prefer to leave it enabled for now so we can have it run on other PRs in the meantime
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: actually my opinion is stronger: I'd prefer to leave it enabled for now so we can have it run on other PRs in the meantime

content.body: when we discussed being blocked, I was thinking we were talking about extended periods of time with no feedback from the esmeta devs
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: when we discussed being blocked, I was thinking we were talking about extended periods of time with no feedback from the esmeta devs

content.body: we should talk about that more, then
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: we should talk about that more, then

content.body: but if it's just that you still want it to run, I'm fine with just disabling the enforcement of the check
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: but if it's just that you still want it to run, I'm fine with just disabling the enforcement of the check

content.body: I don't want to ever be in a situation of being ready to merge a PR but needing to wait for esmeta devs to do things first; I'd thought we said that whenever that situation arose we'd just turn it off
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I don't want to ever be in a situation of being ready to merge a PR but needing to wait for esmeta devs to do things first; I'd thought we said that whenever that situation arose we'd just turn it off

content.body: I wouldn't've wanted to land it under any other conditions
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I wouldn't've wanted to land it under any other conditions
